newsitem.title: ITALY: Ciampi speech on Italy budget in parlt delayed.
newsitem.headline: Ciampi speech on Italy budget in parlt delayed.

text.p: Italian Treasury Minister Carlo Azeglio Ciampi's presentation of the 1997 budget to the lower house of parliament on Thursday was delayed by a hold-up in preceding business, parliamentary officials said.
Ciampi was to have started his speech at 1400 GMT but lack of a quorum during voting on amendments to a decree on construction funding led to a suspension of the sitting until 1445 GMT.
Ciampi arrived at the Chamber of Deputies (lower house) at around 1445 GMT, indicating that he may deliver his speech shortly.
